channel.title: 728 Client Help Please
channel.description: I'm trying to make a sever for me and my friends to mess around on, and I made a signed jar and everything, and when I send it to my friends they get stuck at the "Waiting for updates - 1%" which means it's not connecting to my server. If anyone knows how I can make it work for us, please lemme know asap.

item.title: 728 Client Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Rhylek Rhylek
item.description:
@Rhylek wrote:

I’m trying to make a sever for me and my friends to mess around on, and I made a signed jar and everything, and when I send it to my friends they get stuck at the “Waiting for updates - 1%” which means it’s not connecting to my server. If anyone knows how I can make it work for us, please lemme know asap.

Read full topic
